name: We Were 20
description:
Help the final survivors fend off the hordes of zombies for as long as posible!

In the pre-face you can assign your group to gather resources from the resource box, man the gatling guns or simply defend with their rifles. If a defender is assigned to resource gathering or gatling gun station they are locked to that position during a wave and cannot be reasigned until after the wave. Gathering resourced, building traps, guns and fortifying your fences are critical for survival!
